email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Milwaukee
email_response.body:
Good morning!

I'd like to participate in the satellite upgrade project.

My equipment includes:
- Spectrum analyzer (Anritsu MS2721B)
- Cable tester (Fluke CableIQ)
- OTDR (EXFO MaxTester)

I should note that I don't currently have a bucket truck - I usually rent one for aerial work. Would that be acceptable?

I'm CompTIA Network+ certified and hold an FCC license. Willing to travel throughout the Midwest.

I'm attaching my insurance certificate. Please let me know if additional documentation is needed.

Regards,
Kevin Murphy
Midwest Solutions
(920) 555-0987
